Trojan/rogueware

Unfortunately not a false positive, found in all launchers of all updates and original release by skidrow

Trojan.FakeAlert (fs) is malware that displays a false security warning in order to trick a victim into purchasing rogue anti-spyware products.

can't seem to make it,keeps saying can't find steam_api.dll
